General.Description: Populous is the commercial and billing platform built on Ethereum. Populous uses XBRL, Z Score, smart contracting, stability tags, and other cryptoshpere technologies to create a unique commercial environment for investors and billers. Also, Populous is a P2P (peer-to-peer) financial envelope that is globalizing what is currently a local and limited market area. This is a global billing business platform built on Blockchain's classification technology.
General.Features: Populous coin includes many powerful features. The first feature, High speed and low costs: Funding immediately without a third party; Intelligent contracts themselves make the donation - collect and pay the payments. The second, Global P2P Trade Financing: Residents allow sellers and buyers to bill the transaction regardless of geographic location and don't need any third party. Finally, Unprecedented safety: All uploaded invoices are written to Ethereum Blockchain in a transparent manner to eliminate the possibility of errors and misuse.
General.Technology: Populous has built a fast, powerful service that will disrupt and transform the current billing system. By combining our exclusive smart deal with Blockchain technology and providing these tools for everyone, Populous invites buyers to bill directly to the invoice seller in the P2P platform (peer-to-peer). This will transform the existing billing finance industry into a neat, efficient and profitable eco-system that both the buyer and the seller of the invoice are able to access globally.
